Class ButtonManager

java.lang.Object
ButtonManager
public class ButtonManager extends Object
A helper class that scales and resizes buttons.

      Scales a button container.
      Parameters:
      container - The VBox container to be scaled.
      width - The intended width of the container.
      height - The intended height of the container.
      baseWidth - The base width for scaling.
      baseHeight - The base height for scaling.

    • translateContainer

      public static void translateContainer(javafx.scene.layout.VBox container, double xPosPercentage, double yPosPercentage)
      Translates the container based on a certain percentage.
      Parameters:
      container - The VBox container to be translated.
      xPosPercentage - The percentage of the width to translate the container.
      yPosPercentage - The percentage of the height to translate the container.

      button - The button to be translated.
      xPosPercentage - The percentage of the width to translate the button.
      yPosPercentage - The percentage of the height to translate the button.
